TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GenerateScriptTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class GenerateScriptTypeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class GenerateScriptTypeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定服务器类型必须在代理对象中生成。

span.span: Specifies that the server type must be generated in the proxy object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在支持 AJAX 的 ASP.NET 网站中，ASP.NET 可以为 Web 服务类的方法自动生成代理对象。In AJAX-enabled ASP.NET Web sites, ASP.NET can automatically generate proxy objects for methods of a Web service class. 它针对所有标记为 的 Web 方法的输入参数和返回值执行此功能。It does this for most top-level types for the input parameters and return values of any Web methods that are marked with . 在其他情况下，如果为服务器类型生成了代理对象，则必须手动应用 。In other cases, if you proxy objects generated for server types, you must apply manually. 可以将 应用于 Web 服务本身，也可以应用于标记为 的任何 Web 服务方法或 `static` 页面方法。You can apply to the Web service itself or to any Web service method or `static` page method marked with . 在某些情况下，即使类型对应于 Web 服务方法的输入参数或返回值，也不会自动生成代理。In some cases, even if the type corresponds to an input parameter or return value of a Web service method, the proxy will not be generated automatically. 在这种情况下，必须使用 特性为类型生成代理对象。In that case, you must use the attribute to generate the proxy object for the type. 对于具有多个参数的泛型类型和数组（如 `Dictionary>`），会发生这种情况。This occurs for generic types and arrays that have more than one argument, such as `Dictionary>`. 的一个或多个实例可以应用于 Web 服务类或方法。One or more instances of can be applied to a Web service class or method. 然后，ASP.NET 将针对每个 声明引用的每个顶级类型生成一个 ECMAScript （JavaScript）代理类。ASP.NET will then generate an ECMAScript (JavaScript) proxy class for each top-level type that is referenced by each declaration of . > [!NOTE] > 如果要生成嵌套类型的代理对象，则必须手动将 应用于每个嵌套类型。If you want to generate proxy objects for nested types, you must manually apply to each nested type. ASP.NET 仅为顶级类型生成代理，不会自动以递归方式将该属性应用于嵌套类型。ASP.NET generates proxies only for top-level types and does not automatically recursively apply the attribute to nested types. 有关如何使用特性的详细信息，请参阅[特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 应用于 Web 服务类和 Web 方法。The following example shows how to apply to a Web service class and to a Web method. 因此，`ColorObject` 类型及其嵌套类型 `FavoriteColors` 包含在代理对象中。As a result, the `ColorObject` type and its nested type `FavoriteColors` are included in the proxy object.

related.span: 在 ASP.NET AJAX 中使用 Web 服务

span.span: Using Web Services in ASP.NET AJAX

related.span: 从 ASP.NET AJAX 中的客户端脚本调用 Web 服务

param.name: type
param.span: 要包括在代理类中的类型。

span.span: The type to include in the proxy class.

summary.span: 为指定类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是此构造函数的可选命名参数。The property is an optional named parameter for this constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 为指定的类型生成使用特定的元数据标记类型标识符的代理对象。The following example shows how to use to generate a proxy object for the specified type that uses a specific type identifier for the metadata marker.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ScriptTypeId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ScriptTypeId : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置类型元数据标记的类型标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the type identifier for the type metadata marker.

value.span: 序列化的 JavaScript 对象符号 (JSON) 字符串中的类型元数据标记的类型标识符。

span.span: The type identifier for the type metadata marker on the serialized JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) string.

value.span: 默认值为此类型的程序集限定名称。

span.span: The default value is the assembly-qualified name of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个可选属性。This is an optional property. 如果指定， 的值将用于序列化的 JSON 字符串上的类型元数据标记（"__type"）而不是该类型的程序集限定名称。If specified, the value of is used for the type metadata marker ("__type") on the serialized JSON string instead of the assembly-qualified name of the type. 在反序列化过程中，与 对象关联的类型解析程序将使用类型元数据标记值映射回适当的托管类型。During deserialization, the type resolver that is associated with the object will use the type metadata marker value to map back to the appropriate managed type.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取包含在代理对象中的类型。

span.span: Gets the type that is included in the proxy object.

value.span: 包含在所生成的代理对象中的类型对象。

span.span: The type object that is included in the generated proxy object.
